Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 14 lines of text on the recto and 13 lines on the verso containing a request in form of a letter.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation on 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (126-132, pl.9)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82875) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82875)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Paulos (son of Joseph)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 9 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
